item.text: A hallway to your kitchen and the exit.
You can go to your kitchen to get breakfast or leave for work.
Head to your kitchen and make sure you eat a good breakfast.
you hate taking the bus. It always stresses you out, but it is much faster, and you can't be late to work. (20 minutes)
Walk to work. This is significantly less stressful than the bus, but takes much longer. (50 minutes)
